response.summary: Electrical and Electronic Engineer graduated from Universidad Nacional de Colombia, with strong problem solving, communication and analytical thinking skills. Master Degree in Electrical Engineering – Smart Grids at Politecnico di Milano.
response.skills: Scrum, Internet of Things (IoT), Information Modeling, Digital Twin, Cloud Connectivity, Agile Methodologies, Platform as a Service (PAAS), Software as a Service (SaaS), Communication, Decision-Making, Multicultural adaptability , Customer Service, Italian, Microsoft Azure, Attention to Detail, IP connectivity, Network Fundamentals, Smart Grid, Zenon SCADA, IEC 61850

profile_positions.description: Responsible for managing and prioritizing product requirements related to the IoT platform technology components (Telemetry, Topology and Digital Twin) and supporting the device integration process for the Electrification Common Platform. Working alongside development teams, R&D, and stakeholders, I ensure that needs are represented in the software development process to meet release objectives. I also play a key role in communicating project delivery decisions and resolving issues to ensure timely and smooth delivery, while maintaining a joint project plan for the ABB Electrification Common Platform implementation.
profile_positions.title: ELCP IoT Digital Product Owner

profile_positions.description: Support in the feasibility study of solutions offered to end customers related to the company's digital solutions portfolio that has to do with the ABB Ability Energy and Asset Manager platform. Carry out functional tests, analyze the results, investigate and report failures in the devices, software tools and platform, as well as propose possible improvements. Help internal/external users during the platform commissioning process and, subsequently, train and support them in detecting and solving possible problems, especially those related to communication protocols and the analysis of electrical data collected in case of discrepancies.
profile_positions.title: Digital Operations Specialist

profile_positions.description: Completion of the Master's thesis entitled "Implementation of logic directional selectivity and monitoring system in Low Voltage electrical installation using IEC61850". Which consisted of the Execution of horizontal communication for the implementation of the fault protection system using ABB air circuit breakers and vertical communication for the development of a monitoring system using Zenon SCADA.
profile_positions.title: Internship - Smart Power Lab

profile_positions.description: Provide initial communication and support to customers (e-mail and phone). Identify common support issues and solutions using Routing and Switching technologies (Cisco). Network tools and Routing protocols. Basic knowledge in Firewalls Fortinet. Use of Maximo Software (IBM).
profile_positions.title: Customer Support Engineer

profile_positions.description: Internship in the Windows servers support team.
profile_positions.title: Engineering Intern

company.name: ABB
company.description:
ABB is a technology leader in electrification and automation, enabling a more sustainable and resource-efficient future. The company’s solutions connect engineering know-how and software to optimize how things are manufactured, moved, powered and operated. Building on more than 130 years of excellence, ABB’s ~105,000 employees are committed to driving innovations that accelerate industrial transformation.  www.abb.com
